name: SoccerTwos
setup: Two-versus-two soccer match on a rectangular field with goals at each end.
goal: Score in the opposing goal and prevent goals against your team.

agents.description: Two teams of two agents each; all four agents use the same behavior but with team-specific rewards.

terms: +(1 - time_penalty) for scoring a goal against the opponent.
Small step penalty accumulating over the episode to encourage faster goals.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: Stacked ray-based observations around each agent, encoding ball, goals, teammates, and opponents.
behavior_parameters.actions: 3 discrete branches controlling forward/backward speed, sideways movement, and rotation.
